email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao next month. Could you provide your best freight rate and available vessel for this shipment?

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN QUEEN (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 290m) for this shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 18.50 per MT on a CFR basis. Laycan is 15-20 November. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 18.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 18-23 November?

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 18-23 November. Please confirm.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - OCEAN QUEEN
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: OCEAN QUEEN
- Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 18-23 November
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CFR

Please confirm.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - OCEAN QUEEN
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Looks good. Just one thing: can we confirm the loading window is 72 hours?

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Summary of Terms - OCEAN QUEEN
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Yes, loading window is 72 hours. All other terms remain as per the summary. Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
John Doe
